Drag and drop game board pieces. More...


Functions

function UTILS_StartDragPiece (Obj, Size, event)
 Drag and drop piece board Start drag a piece when click or click and hold button a button over a piece. If click for second time(without hold button) then release piece and send move to server. If click and hold button was set and release the button drop piece and send move to server;.

function UTILS_StartDragPiece (   Obj,
  Size,
  event 
)

Drag and drop piece board Start drag a piece when click or click and hold button a button over a piece. If click for second time(without hold button) then release piece and send move to server. If click and hold button was set and release the button drop piece and send move to server;.

Parameters:
Obj DOM Element
Size Piece size
event Javascript Event
Returns:
True of False
Author:
Rubens Suguimoto

References GAME_RemoveBlockBorder(), GAME_RemoveBlockClass(), GAME_SendMove(), GAME_SetBlockClass(), GAME_ShowLoadingMove(), MainData, OldPos, UTILS_GetMouseCoords(), and UTILS_GetOffset().

Referenced by INTERFACE_NewPiece().
